svg.text: Register Account Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Register Account
Actor(s):
Regular User (UiTM Shah Alam Student)
Description:
Allows new UiTM Shah Alam students to create an account in the Sportea
platform by providing personal information, sports preferences, and authentication credentials.
Preconditions:
1. User must be a UiTM Shah Alam student with valid student email
2. Application must be accessible and registration must be enabled
Main Flow:
1. User navigates to registration page from login page
2. User enters personal information (name, student ID, email)
3. User creates secure password and confirms password match
4. User selects sports preferences and skill levels
5. User provides additional profile details (faculty, location, bio)
6. User agrees to terms of service and privacy policy
7. System validates information and creates account
8. User receives welcome notification and is redirected to home page
9. System awards "Getting Started" achievement with initial XP
Alternative Flows:
A1. Email already exists: System displays error and suggests login
A2. Invalid student email: System validates UiTM email format requirement
A3. Password mismatch: System highlights password confirmation error
A4. Incomplete required fields: System displays validation errors
A5. Network error: System provides retry option with form data preservation
